name: El Septimo - Time Travel Collection - Paris
additionalNotes: El Septimo cigars are known for their traditional entubado rolling method, sharp burn, and rich flavor. They are handmade in Costa Rica. The El Septimo Travel Time Collection pays tribute to Paris and New York, two of the most popular cities in the world. A Costa Rican puro with an ebony, oily wrapper, the Travel Time Collection offers a sophisticated medium-bodied smoking experience with a complexity of flavors that transitions from woodsy to sweetness to spicy.
